name: isa-dsl-language-server
description: Language server and syntax highlighting for ISA DSL files (Langium-based)

scripts.build:prepare: shx mkdir -p ./syntaxes/ && shx cp -f ../language/syntaxes/isa-dsl.tmLanguage.json ./syntaxes/isa.tmLanguage.json || shx cp -f ../language/syntaxes/isa.tmLanguage.json ./syntaxes/isa.tmLanguage.json
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && tsc -b tsconfig.json && node esbuild.mjs
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build:prepare && concurrently -n tsc,esbuild -c blue,yellow "tsc -b tsconfig.json --watch" "node esbuild.mjs --watch"
